docs.snippet: A video of Denver police officers seizing blankets from Jerry Burton and other homeless people in late November created a public outcry. Here, he talks about the city’s laws banning urban camping....
docs.lead_paragraph: A video of Denver police officers seizing blankets from Jerry Burton and other homeless people in late November created a public outcry. Here, he talks about the city’s laws banning urban camping.

headline.main: Sleeping on Denver’s Bitterly Cold Streets

docs.snippet: A massive crowd of mostly barefoot Filipino Catholics joined an annual procession of a centuries-old statue of Jesus Christ held Monday under tight security due to fears of possible retaliation for the killing of an Islamic extremist....

docs.lead_paragraph: Struggling Bundesliga club VfL Wolfsburg signed winger Paul-Georges Ntep from France's Stade Rennes on a deal to 2021 on Monday as they look to boost their attack and avoid relegation.

docs.snippet: Turkey may hold a referendum in the first week of April on a new constitution which would create an executive presidential system, handing incumbent President Tayyip Erdogan greater powers, Deputy Prime Minister Nurettin Canikli said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkey may hold a referendum in the first week of April on a new constitution which would create an executive presidential system, handing incumbent President Tayyip Erdogan greater powers, Deputy Prime Minister Nurettin Canikli said on Monday.

headline.main: Turkey May Hold Referendum on New Constitution in Early April: Deputy PM
headline.print_headline: Turkey May Hold Referendum on New Constitution in Early April: Deputy PM

docs.snippet: Volkswagen AG suffered a new setback on Monday when an executive was charged with conspiracy to defraud the United States over the company's diesel emissions cheating and the automaker was accused of concealing the cheating from regulators....
docs.lead_paragraph: Volkswagen AG suffered a new setback on Monday when an executive was charged with conspiracy to defraud the United States over the company's diesel emissions cheating and the automaker was accused of concealing the cheating from regulators.

docs.snippet: British factory bosses are downbeat about the outlook for the economy after last year's Brexit vote even though they expect their sales both at home and abroad to improve in 2017, an industry survey showed on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: British factory bosses are downbeat about the outlook for the economy after last year's Brexit vote even though they expect their sales both at home and abroad to improve in 2017, an industry survey showed on Monday.

headline.main: UK Factory Bosses See Worse Economy but Better Sales in 2017-EEF
